text: The black marlin (Istiompax indica) is a species of marlin. It is found in tropical and subtropical areas of the Indian and Pacific Oceans. The fish has a maximum length of and weight of . It is one of the largest marlins and also one of the largest bony fish. This marlin is one of the fastest fish, with speeds of up to . This is estimated from the speed that hooked marlins unwind fishing line.BBC Worldwide 2008. Black marlin - the fastest fish on the planet. Ultimate Killers - BBC wildlife. Black marlin are fished commercially and are also a highly prized game fish. == References == Category:Istiophoriformes
title: Black marlin
